        public java.lang.String generateCode()
        Generates random transaction ID and checks for duplicates.
        Returns:
        code String value of format 999-9

      • checkInvalid

        public java.lang.Boolean checkInvalid(org.salespointframework.order.Cart cart,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime)
        Checks for all cart items if they are still in the cart or have timed out
        Parameters:
        cart - Cart user's current cart
        localDateTime - LocalDateTime current date and time
        Returns:
        true if at least one timed out, false if not

      • checkInvalidRes

        public java.lang.Boolean checkInvalidRes(org.salespointframework.order.Cart cart,
                                         java.time.LocalDateTime localDateTime,
                                         java.lang.Integer min,
                                         CProgram cinema_program)
        Checks for all cart items if they are still in the cart or have timed out, or if their corresponding event no longer accepts reservations
        Parameters:
        cart - Cart user's current cart
        localDateTime - LocalDateTime current date and time
        min - Integer Minutes left before an event's start time still allowing reservations
        cinema_program - CProgram event list
        Returns:
        true if at least one timed out, false if not

        Formats money values into proper German format.
        Parameters:
        money - Money monetary amount to be formatted
        Returns:
        output String of number without currency symbol
